A Re-Balanced Game of Mafia

RULES:
I stole all of this from BBmolla who stole from Quadz cause I'm lazy.

General:
  • The Site Rules apply.
  • I reserve the right to alter these rules if I deem it necessary, including retroactively enforcing new/altered rules.
  • Use bold text to communicate with me in thread, or you may send me a PM.
  • All night actions will be resolved with a modified version of Natural Action Resolution.
  • Purple is my color. Do not use it.
  • All roles have been given out by Random.org.

Game Specific:
  • This game features an open setup. Scroll down to the bottom of this post to see sample PMs.
  • As such all roles are revealed pre-game. There are 8 Vanilla Townies, 1 Town Macho Cop, 1 Town Doctor, and 3 Mafia Goons.
  • Anyone from the Mafia may submit the nightkill or no kill, with the last action in their Private Topic before deadline going through.

Voting/Lynching:
  • Voting will be done either using the [vote] tag, or in this format: vote: Carter.
  • There will be no voting trickery. If something is clearly intended to be a vote for a specific player, I will treat it as such.
  • A lynch will occur when half-plus-one of living players (rounded down) are voting for the same player. As soon as the hammer vote is cast, the game will enter Twilight.
  • Players may vote for No Lynch. A No Lynch will be hammered at half of living players (rounded up), not half-plus-one.
  • All living players (including the lynchee) may talk in Twilight, but any voting/unvoting will not count. Twilight will last until I post the final vote count / scene.
  • Roles will be revealed at death.
  • Once dead, you are allowed a single ‘bah’ post (containing nothing game related) at the beginning of the next Day Phase.
  • If there is no majority at deadline, a no-lynch will occur.

Deadlines:
  • Day phases will have a deadline of 2 weeks from the daybreak scene.
  • Day phases are extendable in the case of extenuating circumstances.
  • Night phases will have a deadline of 2 days from the lynch scene.
  • Prods will be given if a player has not posted in 48 hours.
  • A player must respond, in-thread, to a prod within 48 hours, or they will be replaced. If the 48 hours runs into Night Phase, they must PM me within the same time frame.

Don’t Be Stupid:
  • Play to your win condition.
  • Don’t use hidden or encrypted text. You may use small text, unless it is hiding game-related or important information.
  • Do not excessively insult your fellow players. Insult the play, not the person.
  • Have fun. No, really. Have fun.

Sample PMs:

8 of you will receive:
Welcome, ActionDan, you are a Vanilla Townie.

Abilities
  • During the Day, you may vote for whomever you want lynched.
  • During the Night, you may sleep.

Win Condition
You win when all threats to the Town are eliminated and at least one Town-aligned player is still alive, or nothing can prevent the same.


3 of you will receive
Welcome, ActionDan, you are a Mafia Goon.

Abilities
  • During the Day, you may vote for whomever you want lynched.
  • Factional Kill - The Mafia may kill one player per Night. This may be done in addition to other actions.
  • Factional Communication - If there are other Mafia-aligned players, there will be a Mafia QT that can be used pre-game and during the Night.

Win Condition
You win when all town players are eliminated and at least one Mafia-aligned player is still alive (or nothing can prevent the same).


1 of you will receive:
Welcome, ActionDan, you are a Town Macho Cop.

Abilities
  • During the Day, you may vote for whomever you want lynched.
  • Cop - During the Night, you may select a target to investigate. You will receive a result of either "not mafia" or "mafia" at the start of the day phase
  • Macho - You are immune to Protection. You will die if shot by mafia even if the doctor protects you the same night

Win Condition
You win when all threats to the Town are eliminated and at least one Town-aligned player is still alive, or nothing can prevent the same.


1 of you will receive:
Welcome, ActionDan, you are a Town Doctor.

Abilities
  • During the Day, you may vote for whomever you want lynched.
  • Doctor - During the Night, you may choose some one to protect from the mafia night kill. Your target cannot die that night unless they are the Town Macho Cop

Win Condition
You win when all threats to the Town are eliminated and at least one Town-aligned player is still alive, or nothing can prevent the same.
